system.description:
You have been entrusted with both great supernatural power and great authority in the service of your divine patron. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your Marshal levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.98ceg9uqvmr74u1z]{Sacred Presence} feature.
  • When you use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} to direct another creature to attack, it also gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). These temporary hit points last until the creature begins a rest.
  • Your cleric levels count as Marshal levels for the purpose of acquiring the marshal’s @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.8mqtpdstwwedaxwq]{Stronghold} feature, and if you select a temple or sacred grove, you can gain an additional free seasoned follower chosen from one of the following types: apothecary, diviner, healer, interpreter, or sage.
